field.label: Enable
field.help: Enable or disable this upstream DNS server.

field.label: Server IP
field.help: IP address of DNS server to forward all requests.

field.label: Server Port
field.help: Port of DNS server, for usual DNS use 53, if you use DoT set it to 853.

field.label: Validate Certificate
field.help: Here you can set the SNI in server certificate to validate the remote nameserver.
